page.title: 02TOWN,BEACH'S AND DOCKS
page.content: I would describe the town as quite a big place and quite a busy place especially on Thursday evening that is the main shopping day.Holiday makers and sight see'ers are attracted to the town,especially late season looking for souviners and other charms. There are many quite differant shops in the town some that sell clothes,newspapers,confectionary and other interesting things. BEACHES. In Falmouth there are four very nice beaches which consists of Swanpool,Gyllingvase,Tunnel and Castle.Gyllingvase is the best beach because there aren't any rocks at all unlike the others. DOCKS The docks is a very busy place.
